caption.p: ( a) XRD patterns of Co@CNTs-T (T = 600, 700, 800, and 900, respectively); ( b) Raman spectra of Co@CNTs-T (T = 600, 700, 800, and 900, respectively); ( c) XPS survey spectra of Co@CNTs-800; ( d) C 1s XPS spectra of Co@CNTs-800; ( e) N 1s XPS spectra of Co@CNTs-800; ( f) Co 2p XPS spectra of Co@CNTs-800.
